column4: It is pretty straight forward, just put a line in with an IP address and a domain name  you want it to resolve to on a line in /etc/hosts.  That's it.
but what should the domain name be? I have been unable to set up sendmail properly to email. I think it's a /etc/hosts problem
It is more than likelynot a /etc/hosts problem.  Look elswhere
most google results of "dsn=5.6.0, stat=Data format error
